rules.to: log.(	    $exists(level)?	    $~>|$|{	            "level":level	    }|	    :	        $~>|$|{	            "level":"critical",	            "message":"there is not log.level. Message: " & message	        }|	)		/*	[	    {	        "log":         	            {	                "level":"debug",	                "message":"there is Message"	            }	    },	    {	        "log":         	            {	                "message":"there is Message",	                "context":{}	            }	    }	]	*/

$.(		    (log.level in ["error","alert","critical"])?(	            $merge([	                $exists(log.context)?log.context:{},	                $exists(rlln)?	                {	                    "rlln":rlln	                }:{},	                $exists(payload)?	                {	                    "payload":payload	                }:{},	                {	                    "globs":{	                        "dlvdCache":$globalContext("dlvdCache"),	                        "saveCache":$globalContext("saveCache"),	                        "RLST":$globalContext("RLST")	                    	                    }	                }	            ])    	        	    ):(	        $exists(log.context)?log.context:{}	    )	)		/*								    (	        log.level in ["error","alert","critical"]	            and 	        $exists(log.context)	    )?	        rlln	    :	        ($exists(log.context)?(log.context):null)	)			[	    {	        "log":         	            {	                "level":"error",	                "message":"there is Message"	            },	        "rlln":{"evnt":{}}   	    },	    {	        "log":         	            {	                "level":"info",	                "message":"there is Message",	                "context":{"arr":[1,2]}	            },	        "rlln":{"evnt":{}}   	    },	    {	        "log":         	            {	                "level":"info",	                "message":"there is Message",	                "context":{"arr":[1,2]}	            }	    },	    {	        "log":         	            {	                "level":"info",	                "message":"there is Message"	            }	    }	    	]		*/

name: autohowtobuy2_2
property: INFO.(	   autohowtobuy2=null 	   and 	   howtobuy=null 	   and 	   ship_status!="shipped"	)

rules.to: $~>|$|{	   "count":(	       crm.output.entity.context.updated_fields.status = "Order creation" and (	           crm.output.entity.data.status = "Pending"      or    crm.output.entity.data.status = "Parcels preparation"      or    crm.output.entity.data.status = "Archive" 	       )	   ) ?1:0	}|

$~>|$|{"payload":(crm.output.context.(	   mp_name!=null 	   and 	   mp_order_number!=null 	   and 	   mp_ship_method!=null 	   and 	   date_cr_paid!=null 	   and 	   date_ship_by!=null 	   and 	   date_deliver_by!=null 	   and 	   problem_description="-"	))	?{	   "actions": [	       {	           "action": "update",	           "entity_id": "1",	           "entity_type": "deal",	           "entity_data": {	               "status": "Parcels preparation"	           },	           "delay": 0,	           "lifecycle_token": "1234567890"         	       }    	   ] 	}:{	   "actions": [] 	}}|

$~>|$|{"payload":(crm.output.context.(	   mp_name!=null 	   and 	   mp_order_number!=null 	   and 	   mp_ship_method!=null 	   and 	   date_cr_paid!=null 	   and 	   date_ship_by!=null 	   and 	   date_deliver_by!=null 	   and 	   problem_description="-"	))	?{	   "actions": [	       {	           "action": "update",	           "entity_id": "1",	           "entity_type": "deal",	           "entity_data": {	               "status": "Parcels preparation"	           },	           "delay": 0,	           "lifecycle_token": "1234567890"         	       }    	   ] 	}:{	   "actions": [] 	}}|

$~>|$|{"payload":(crm.output.context.(	   mp_name!=null 	   and 	   mp_order_number!=null 	   and 	   mp_ship_method=null 	   and 	   date_cr_paid=null 	   and 	   date_ship_by=null 	   and 	   date_deliver_by=null 	   and 	   problem_description="-"	   and	   status="Order creation"	))	?{	   "actions": [	       {	           "action": "update",	           "entity_id": "1",	           "entity_type": "deal",	           "entity_data": {	               "status": "Pending"	           },	           "delay": 0,	           "lifecycle_token": "1234567890"         	       }    	   ] 	}:{	   "actions": [] 	}}|

$~>|$|{	   "payload":(	       crm.output.context.(	           tracknumbers_in_MP!=null 	   and 	   problem_description="-"	   and	   status="Parcels preparation"		       )	   )	?{	       "actions": [	           {	               "action": "update",	               "entity_id": "1",	               "entity_type": "deal",	               "entity_data": {	                   "status": "60 day test"	           },	               "delay": 0,	               "lifecycle_token": "1234567890"         	       }    	   ] 	}:{	   "actions": [] 	}	}|

$~>|$|{	   "payload":(	       crm.output.context.(	           mp_name="Amazon Shoptimistic" 	   and 	   (	               status="Order creation"	       or	       status="Pending"	   	           )	   and 	   (	               problem_description="client canceled"	       or	       problem_description="order canceled" 	   	           )		       )	   )	?{	       "actions": [	           {	               "action": "update",	               "entity_id": "1",	               "entity_type": "deal",	               "entity_data": {	                   "status": "Archive"	           	               },	               "delay": 0,	               "lifecycle_token": "1234567890"         	       	           }    	   	       ] 		   }:{	   "actions": [] 	}	}|

$~>|$|{	   "count":(	       crm.output.entity.context.updated_fields.status = "Order creation" and (	           crm.output.entity.data.status = "Pending"      or    crm.output.entity.data.status = "Parcels preparation"      or    crm.output.entity.data.status = "Archive" 	       )	   ) ?1:0	}|

$~>|$|{"count":(crm.output.entity.context.updated_fields.status = "Order creation" and (    crm.output.entity.data.status = "Pending"      or    crm.output.entity.data.status = "Parcels preparation"      or    crm.output.entity.data.status = "Archive" )) ?1:0}|

$~>|$|{"count":(crm.output.entity.context.updated_fields.status = "Order creation" and (    crm.output.entity.data.status = "Pending"      or    crm.output.entity.data.status = "Parcels preparation"      or    crm.output.entity.data.status = "Archive" )) ?1:0}|

(	   $~>|$|{	       "payload":(	           crm.output.entity.row.(	               how_to_buy4=null	               and	               how_to_buy3_result=null	               and	               tracknumbers_in_mp=null	               )	       ) ? {	           "messages": [],	           "data": [	               {	                   "action": {	                       "type": "remote_request",	                       "context": {	                           "headers": {},	                           "body": "test",	                           "url": "https://au-howtobuy-node-red.rollun.net/autohowtobuy2",	                           "method": "GET"         	               	                       },	                       "delay": 0       	           	                   },	                   "entity":{	                       "type":crm.output.entity.type,	                       "name":crm.output.entity.name,	                       "rowId":crm.output.entity.row.id           	               	                   }   	       	               }   	   	           ],	           "code": "200" 		       }:{    "messages": [],    "data":[]    } 	   }|	).payload
